alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 11 at 3:16AM MST until December 14 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and significant blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Johnson County. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to nearly impossible due to very low visibility in snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Before venturing out, motorists should check current road conditions by visiting wyoroad.info or by dialing 511.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
